name: Swordswallower
description:
Install instructions

Played with WASD and mouse. Pressing T restarts you at the last checkpoint if you need to.

We advise against using a trackpad.

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR MAC BUILD:

If you have Mac OS Mojave or later, there are a couple additional steps:

  1. Download/Install as normal
  2. Move the installed application out of the downloads folder and onto the desktop
  3. Control-click the application, click "Open," then click "Open" on the dialogue that appears
